segments.text: The girl looks so innocent, just waiting for a cookie from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can tell she trusts him completely, even though he’s about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so unstable, and the boy doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve ever been caught before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely oblivious to their little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I’m watching a scene from a silent movie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s determination is impressive, but it’s also dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get hurt when the stool finally tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is making everything worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a little amused by the whole situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s calmness is almost surreal.
segments.speaker: PAR
